alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Gibson; Knox; Pike (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 06 at 9:17PM EST until January 10 at 5:48AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at Montezuma and Terre Haute. White River at Edwardsport. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River at Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site to Riverton... and at Mount Carmel. White River at Petersburg and at Hazleton. East Fork White River near Rivervale. .Upwards of two inches of rainfall this past weekend put several rivers across central Indiana into flood. Minor flooding is expected to continue on the lower Wabash River through this weekend...and on the lower White River through early next week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Petersburg. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Low bottomlands flood and flooding begins on higher bottomlands. State Road 257 may begin to flood if Shoals gage reading is over 17 feet. Private levees may be overtopped in many cases. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM EST Thursday /7:30 PM CST Thursday/ the stage was 19.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM EST Thursday /7:30 PM CST Thursday/ was 19.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.3 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued by noon Friday.
